summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Corson Avenue, from Myrtle Street to Duwamish Avenue; Carleton Avenue, from East Marginal Way to Bailey Street; Flora Avenue, from Myrtle Street to Bailey Street; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6819 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
